item.title: Serge
item.description: Reference: Unknown, Serge & Leena on Opassa Beach

item.title: Star-Sieged Mind
item.description: The voids in my head wish to fill the silence, so they speak your name. A whisper whizzing by as a shooting star, I wish upon their jeweled wonders, cosmic seas of speckled fable the Great Bear and her cubs, the legend of Orion, a muse for my writings, to dot my own constellation scribbled idea, outlines a vague contour of your image. I have met many a platitude on the dream shorelines voyaging contradiction and clarity, I seek no wisdom but absorb them as I have seen traces of millennium glory, previous experiments before us— scrapped to galatic dust, streamlines of fluidic chaos, a single strip could span a century to decipher in full, or one of the Lord’s lemmas: ℵ,Λ*= ∂i;ψ
